column4: I'm on my way!

column4: Make another run.

column4: Agreed.

column3: あきらめる
column4: I give up.

column3: あきらめる
column4: No way.

column3:
おや今度はアンチェの手伝いかい？

まぁ氷を持ってきてさえくれたら
誰でもいいんだけどさ
それで…氷はまだかい？
column4:
Oh? You're helping out Anche now?


Well, as long as someone brings me ice, 
I'm good. So... Any ice for me yet?

column3:
おや何度も悪いねぇ…

運んできた氷は
ここに置いてくれるかい？
column4:
Sorry to ask so many times...


Could you bring the ice here?

column3:
もちろん いいが…新しい氷にするなら
更に50ルピー"支払ってもらうことになるぞ？
column4:
Of course that's fine, but new ice will be
an additional 50 rupees. Is that OK?

column3:
おお良い所に来てくれたな
また氷をフロスさんに届けてくれないか？
本来なら私が届けるのだが…

この辺りも魔物が増えてきてな
氷室を離れられないのだ
運ぶ前に氷の代金として 50ルピーを
前払いしてもらうことになるが
運び終えたら前払いした代金を
フロスさんから渡してもらえるはずだ
早く運んで大きい氷を届ければ
フロスさんも報酬をはずんでくれるだろうよ
column4:
Oh! Talk about great timing! 
Can you go deliver ice to Furosa again?

Usually I'm the one who's supposed to
deliver it, but...

Lately there've been more and more
monsters skulking around here, so I
can't be away from the icehouse.
Of course, before you carry the ice,
I'll have to ask you to pay the 50 rupees
for it in advance.
Once you've delivered it, Furosa should
be able to reimburse you for the cost of
the ice.
And if you deliver it quickly, Furosa will
probably reward you for the effort, too.

column3:
おお氷をフロスさんに届けてくれるのか？

氷の代金として 50ルピーを
前払いしてもらうことになるが…
column4:
Oh, you'll deliver the ice to Furosa for
me?

I'll have to ask you to pay the 50 rupees
for the ice in advance, though...

column3:
分秒で運んでくるなんざ
アンタも慣れたもんだねぇ
氷の代金と…
今回の報酬は こんなもんでいいだろう
それにしても アンチェのヤツ
良いバイトを見つけたもんだね
column4:
You did it in :.? 
You're like a professional ice deliverer.

Including the price of the ice...
I'm assuming this reward feels ample
for services rendered, right?
Sounds like Anche is happy managing
the icehouse. Seems to suit her.

column3:
まさか…
たった分秒で運んでくるとは
想像以上の速さで言うことナシだよ

それじゃあ氷の代金と…
報酬は多めにしてあげるよ
それにしても アンチェのヤツ
良いバイトを見つけたもんだね
column4:
You've got to be kidding me.
Ice delivered in :.?

That is WAY beyond my expectations!
You're like a savant at ice running.

Let me reimburse you for the price of
the ice...and I'd better dig deep for 
something extra to reward a run like that!
Anche must be happy...because the ice
sure seems happy!

column3:
どうした？
もたもたしている場合じゃないぞ
column4:
Standing around in the desert is a great
idea if you want to let ALL THE ICE MELT.

column3: 氷が溶けてしまった
column4: The ice melted.

column3:
おっそうこなくっちゃ
運び先は前と同じで…
ゲルドの街へ行く途中に 
遺跡群があるのはわかるな？
そこの出口…街に近い所で
フロスさんが待っているはずだ
column4:
Yes! That's the spirit!
So you're heading to the same place
as before...
There's a group of ruins on the way to 
Gerudo Town—you know those? Furosa
should be at the exit nearest to town.

column3:
無理にとは言わないが…

こっちは常に人手不足なんだ
いつでも歓迎するよ
column4:
Hey, look, I'm not going to force you to
do it—nobody needs a surly ice runner.

But we're always understaffed, so 
anytime you feel like helping, come by.

column3:
50ルピー持っていないのか？
それじゃあ頼めないな
column4:
You don't have 50 rupees?
Well, then I can't ask you to do this.

column3:
ルピーが足りないぞ
今回はあきらめるか？
column4:
You don't have enough rupees. 
Maybe just give up on this for now?

column3: 次は頼んだぞ
column4: I'll be counting on you next time!

column3:
おーい！道から大きく外れてるぞ！
一度戻ってこい！
column4:
Hey! You're getting pretty far off the
path! Come back here for a minute!

column3:
仕事を受けておいて寄り道か？まったく…
氷の代金を前払いでもらっておいてよかったよ
column4:
Taking a detour after accepting work?Good grief... Thank goodness I got
payment for that ice in advance.

column3:
できればまた運んで欲しいんだが…
もう一度頼まれてくれないかい？
いいカクテルを出すために
氷はいくつあっても困らないからさ…
アンチェから氷を受け取るときに
また氷の代金50ルピーを払っといておくれ
column4:
If you could, I would love it if you'd
make another run... Think you could
find it in your heart to go again?
You need lots of ice to serve good 
cocktails, you know?

When you get the ice from Anche, make
sure you pay 50 rupees for it.

column3:
ありがとうよ…

それじゃあ ここで待ってるから
氷を持ってきておくれよ
column4:
Thank you... I'll be waiting here, so 
please bring me that ice!

column3:
そうかい…残念だね

また手伝ってくれるなら
アンチェに声かけてやっておくれよ…
column4:
I see... Ah, well. If you feel like helping
out, then talk to Anche...

column3:
できればもっと運んで欲しいんだが
今ごろ アンチェは寝てるだろうしね…
また今度 よろしく頼むよ
column4:
I want to ask you to make another run,
but Anche will be sound asleep now...
Come by later, why don't you?
